headline: Toy prices will take on tariff costs this Christmas: Basic Fun! CEO
summary: With the kickoff to the holiday season just days away and plenty of retailers already offering Black Friday deals, Numerator reported 14.3% of American consumers expect to spend less on toys this holiday and 26.4% of respondents expecting to spend somewhat less. Basic Fun! CEO Jay Foreman sits down with Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman to discuss the impact that 2025's tariff environment has had on the toymaker, its prices, and retail inventories. Basic Fun! has licensing agreements to make and sell products from premier toy lines like My Little Pony, Hello Kitty, Tonka Trucks, Littlest Pet Shop, and Care Bears. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
